description.description: A description of the trend presented to the user.

sortOrder.description: The order in which this trend should appear relative to others. Trends are sorted from lowest sortOrder to highest.

brand.description: The brand associated with this trend.

alcoholContent.description: The percentage of alchol in the brand's products.

family.description: An optional grouping for similar brands, for instance, Bud Light Lime and Bud Light may share a brand family.

foodPairing.description: Suggested foods to consume along with the brand.

glasswareID.description: The ID of the brand's associated glassware.

marketingCopy.description: Marketing copy for the brand displayed in Brand Details.

romanceCopy.description: A succinct description of the brand displayed in Product Ordering.

servingTemperature.description: The ideal condition to serve the brand's products.

sortOrder.description: Used to set the displayed order of brands in the app.

style.description: The beer style of the brand, for instance, Indian Pale Ale.

trueBrewer.description: The actual brewer of the beer.

imageURL.description: A url or path to a local file.

brandName.description: The name of the item's parent brand.

inventoryCount.description: The number of items currently in stock. Specify 0 for out of stock or unavailable items and -1 for unknown.

minimumOrderQuantity.description: How many total items a user must have in their truck in order to ship an order including this item.

name.description: A name for the item displayable to the user.

popularityRating.description: An arbitrary float representing how popular this item is. Items with greater popularityRatings will sort to the top by default.

unitPrice.description: The top-line price for the item.

startDate.description: The effective starting date of the price.Preferred format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

endDate.description: The date this price will expire. Preferred format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

itemIDs.description: An array of itemIDs that describe which items this discount is associated with.

type.description: Specify AO, PO, CF. AO = Amount off, PO = Percent Off, CF = Credit Free.

earnLevelAmount.description: The amount that must be spent to earn a discount

earnLevelQuantity.description: The number of items that must be purchased to earn a discount

earnedItem.description: The item earned by a CF type discount

discountAmount.description: The total value of the discount.

itemCount.description: The number of bottles/cans/kegs in a single container. If a package contains 2 6-packs, 6.

itemSize.description: The volume of a single keg, bottle, or can in a package.

returnable.description: Marks whether the package may be returned or not.

unitCount.description: The number of containers in a package. If a package contains 2 6-packs, 2.

caseEquivalency.description: The number of cases the package equates to. A case is defined as 24 x 12 fl oz containers

adjustedCaseEquivalency.description: The value used to determine this packages contribution to achieving the order minimum. This property may be used to increase or reduce the effect of adding a given package to an order.

imageURL.description: A path to the glassware's image.

description.description: A show description of the glassware.

name.description: A name for the glassware, e.g. Pint Glass.

brandIDs.description: An array identifying brands associated with the glassware
